Package: build.tmp.groovydoc

[Groovy] Class VideoPoker

    • build.tmp.groovydoc.VideoPoker

    • Class where our main game logic lives.

      • Properties Summary

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          int  currentBet
          Deck  deck
          Evaluator  evaluator
          Hand  hand
          int  maxBet
          boolean  quitGame
          When the player hits Q, this is toggled to true and the game ends.
          int  roundState
          java.util.Scanner  scanner
          Streams user input to the game.
          int  tokens
          Starting number of tokens

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          void deal()
          Deal the cards and handle cleanup and evaluation of a player's hand as well as awarding and reserving tokens.

          Deal the needed cards.

          Display a representation of the game state.

      • Property Detail

        • int currentBet

        • Deck deck

        • Evaluator evaluator

        • Hand hand

        • int maxBet

        • boolean quitGame

          When the player hits Q, this is toggled to true and the game ends.

        • int roundState

        • java.util.Scanner scanner

          Streams user input to the game.

        • int tokens

          Starting number of tokens

      • Method Detail

        • void deal()

          Deal the cards and handle cleanup and evaluation of a player's hand as well as awarding and reserving tokens.

        • void dealHand()

          Deal the needed cards. If it is after the player has selected a bet, 5 cards are drawn. At any other point, it's the number of cards the player has elected to replace.

        • void drawScreen(boolean showEvaluator = true)

          Display a representation of the game state.

          Parameters:
          showEvaluator - whether or now to tell the player what hand they are holding.

        • void incrementBet()

          Increment the players bet by one. It rolls over to 1 when the maximum bet is reached.

        • void init()

          Show the initialization screen and shuffle the decks.

        • static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        • void processInput()

          Process the input from a user.
